name: Immune Defense (T3mpii)
description:
This is the current version of a game initially made in the Ludum Dare Game Jam, find the  Jam Version of the game here:

https://t3mpii.itch.io/immune-defense

Rate My Game (The Jam Version):

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/immune-defense

Controlls:

-Move with WASD, or the arrow keys

-Aim with the mouse

-Shoot with mouse0 or space

Gameplay:

-In each level you have to kill all the viruses before they kill your human.

-Every virus damages the human in a specific interval, which isn’t identical for all viruses though.

-You have to be patient while fighting the viruses since they can also harm you on contact.
